body.p:
AS
Flemingsburg,^(Fleming County)^ Ky.
May 28, 1863
Dear Sir,

Mr. James Lansdown Jr. a volunteer soldier of the 24th Ky. Regt. was Brutally murdered in the town of Poplar Plains on Tuesday evening last 26 inst by James Caldwell & Kennedy two notorious rebel recruiting officers of Campbell County, Ky. and they were making their way towards that County when last heard from. I, under the circumstances respectfully petition that you offer the highest possible reward for them, & do so promptly, to ensure their arrest, & I make this as the County Judge of this (Fleming) County, under the law providing for my petition to that effect, to authorize you to makeoffer the reward as requested for their apprehension,

Your prompt attention
will oblige yours truly,
L. B. Cox County Judge

To his Excellency
The Governor,
Frankfort,
Ky.

To his Excellency,
the Governor.
Frankfort,
Ky
Important

L.B. Cox County Judge
Fleming County
Ask reward to be offered for two murderers
